The Header element represents the introductory content or a set of navigational links for the webpage, while the Nav element represents a section of navigation links. In this documentation, we will explore the purpose, usage, and best practices for implementing the HTML5 Header and Nav elements. ### Objective and Scope The objective of this documentation is to provide a comprehensive guide on using the HTML5 Header and Nav elements. It aims to help web developers understand the purpose and usage of these elements and provide step-by-step instructions for their implementation.
